casebody.data:
SOMA TECHNOLOGY, INC.
v.
DALAMAGAS, et al. 308A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2017 Daniel F.E. Smith, Robert J. King, III, Jonathan M. Shapiro, Attorneys at Law, for Soma Technology, Inc. Sam McGee, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Desai, Hiren. Paul J. Stevens, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Dalamagas, Photios, et al. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 21st of November 2017 by Plaintiff to Withdraw Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of November 2017."
